communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Complaints received regarding or mentioning the following departments and offices:

Durango Police Department
Englewood Police Department
Cherry Hills Village Police Department
Pagosa Springs Police Department
Archuleta County Sheriff
Lone Tree Police Department
Arapahoe County Sheriff
Greenwood Village Police Department

In the past 180 days.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samuel Newton

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

In the last 180 days:

Complaints and Correspondence from the Attorney General:
        Any complaints or correspondence received from the Attorney General's office.
        Records or documentation related to the frequency and nature of these complaints.

    Records of Complaints:
        Any records, correspondence, memos or documentation detailing the frequency and nature of complaints received by the Durango Police Department.

    Writs of Mandamus Related to FOI, CORA, CJRA Requests:
        Any records of Writs of Mandamus received by the Durango Police Department in relation to Freedom of Information (FOI), Colorado Open Records Act (CORA), or Colorado Criminal Justice Records Act (CJRA) requests.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samuel Newton

title: Request to DoD for all communications with writer/producer David Frigerio from 2020-2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between the Department of Defense (DoD) and the Hollywood writer/producer David Frigerio during the period 2020-2024 (up to the present), particularly in connection with the production of the 2024 movie "Land of Bad" that Mr. Frigerio co-wrote and produced. Such communications may include, but should not be limited to, emails, correspondence, memos, and transcriptions of telephone calls.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to DoD for all communications with director/producer William Eubank from 2020-2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between the Department of Defense (DoD) and the Hollywood director/producer William Eubank (born William C. Eubank, on November 15, 1982, in Holyoke, Massachusetts) during the period 2020-2024 (up to the present), particularly in connection with the production of the 2024 movie "Land of Bad" that Mr. Eubank directed. Such communications may include, but should not be limited to, emails, correspondence, memos, and transcriptions of telephone calls.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
